original_title: Raphael Saadiq: Live from the Artists Den
overview: Inspired by the smooth sounds of 1960s soul music, rhythm and blues, singer Raphael Saadiq performs a lively set of feel-good tracks from his album, "The Way I See It," including "Let's Take a Walk," "100 Yard Dash," "Love That Girl" and "Sometimes." Former member of the groups Tony! Toni! Ton√©! and Lucy Pearl, Saadiq has also produced songs for fellow artists such as Joss Stone, Snoop Dogg, D'Angelo and John Legend.
title: Raphael Saadiq: Live from the Artists Den
